name: TRIVIACOMICS
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trivia comics
Developer Terms of Use
des: Welcome to Trivia COMICS! You've come to the right place if you're a superhero enthusiast. This skill is designed to test your knowledge of iconic characters like Batman and Iron Man with questions that will increase in difficulty as you progress. You'll get to explore fascinating backstories and powers while having fun learning. Best of all, it's suitable for all ages, so it's perfect for family-friendly fun. And don't worry about your privacy or safety - no personal information is collected. So put on your superhero cape and dive in!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
